questions.text: How is the decimal integer `199` represented in a binary file compared to a text file?

choices.label: As the characters '1', '9', '9' in both files.

choices.label: As the characters '1', '9', '9' in the text file and as a single byte value (hex C7) in the binary file.
choices.text: As the characters '1', '9', '9' in the text file and as a single byte value (hex C7) in the binary file.

questions.explanation: A serializable object must be an instance of the `java.io.Serializable` interface. This is a marker interface with no methods.
